page.title: 16INDUSTRY JOINTINES
page.content: Jointines began in 1929 making gasket paper.They are now the world's number one gasket paper makers. They also produce thermal and heat sensitive papers,which have many and varied uses in industry. Jointines employ 200 people. Over 50% of their production goes for export. They make paper for car air filters and a special paper for the insides of batteries. Jointines are part of a larger company,Wiggins Teap. The company has sales distributors in eight other countries. They operate a training scheme for all aspects of their operations. Production is 24 hours a day,seven days a week.
